channel.title: (Admin read this please) server posting
channel.description: Hi i wanted to post my server on the server status page but im running it through a vps but i cant connect to moparscape through the vps on the internet so i was just wondering if could post the server page on my main desktop (computer) but still have it connect to the vps because everytime i try it says server is offline etc... because its trying to connect to it on my computer.

item.title: (Admin read this please) server posting
